title: Spinoza; a Renegade Jew - a Collection
description:
Spinoza; a Renegade Jew - a Collection:

We have 30 titles here:

-  Bunge (Ed.) - The Continuum Companion to Spinoza (2011)

-  Curley (Ed.) - A Spinoza Reader; the Ethics and Other Works (1994)

-  Damasio - Looking for Spinoza; Joy, Sorrow, and the Feeling Brain (2003)

-  Deveaux - The Role of God in Spinoza's Metaphysics (2007)

-  Dijn - Spinoza; the Way to Wisdom (1996)

-  Goldstein - Betraying Spinoza; the Renegade Jew Who Gave Us Modernity (2006)

-  Jarrett - Spinoza; a Guide for the Perplexed (2007)

-  Katz - The Pale God; Israeli Secularism and Spinoza's Philosophy of Culture (2011)

-  Kisner - Spinoza on Human Freedom; Reason, Autonomy and the Good Life (2011)

-  Koistinen & Biro (Eds.) - Spinoza; Metaphysical Themes (2002)

-  Levene - Spinoza's Revelation; Religion, Democracy, and Reason (2004)

-  Lord - Spinoza's Ethics; an Edinburgh Philosophical Guide (2010)

-  Lordon - Willing Slaves of Capital; Spinoza & Marx on Desire (2010)

-  Mason - The God of Spinoza; a Philosophical Study (1997)

-  Melamed & Rosenthal (Eds.) - Spinoza's Theological-Political Treatise; a Critical Guide (2010)

-  Melamed (Ed.) - The Young Spinoza; a Metaphysician in the Making (2015)

-  Nadler - A Book Forged in Hell; SpinozaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Scandalous Treatise and the Birth of the Secular Age (2011)

-  Nadler - Spinoza's Ethics; an Introduction (2006)

-  Negri - Subversive Spinoza; (Un)contemporary Variations (2004)

-  Pollock - Spinoza, His Life and Philosophy, 2e (1899)

-  Popkin - Spinoza (2004)

-  Prokhovnik - Spinoza and Republicanism (2004)

-  Rocca - Spinoza (2008)

-  Schwartz - The First Modern Jew; Spinoza and the History of an Image (2012)

-  Scruton - Spinoza; a Very Short Introduction (2002)

-  Sharp - Spinoza and the Politics of Renaturalization (2011)

-  Strauss - Spinoza's Critique of Religion (1965)

-  The Cambridge Companion to Spinoza (2006)

-  Vardoulakis (Ed.) - Spinoza Now (2011)

 - Wolf - Spinoza's Short Treatise on God  Man and His Well-Being (1910)
